about_the_game:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, loud sounds, and lots of jumpscares.


CornField is a cooperative first-person horror game for 1-5 players. Collect all the necessary items and escape the cornfield! Run, scream, hide, but most importantly don't get caught!

What is your challenge?

CornField takes place in a corn maze where there are several different items that will allow you to get out of the never ending corn maze and also help you defend yourself against the kller, who will be played as by one of your friends or the AI. Kliller will do everything he can to kill you all but you'll make it!

Can you do it?

  • Playability
  • CornField has simple controls for surviving in the cornfield, even for a killer it won't be hard. Killer has several different attacks to catch up with the survivors.

  • Online co-op for 1-5 players
  • If there are few players or you are only one, the AI will play instead of the killer. However, if there are enough of you, one of you will play as the Killer and the others will be the survivors. There can be at least 1 killer and in some game modes there can be more killers.

  • Repeatability
      []Repeatability[]The full version of CornField offers many different maps and game modes (but not in demo or early access). You'll never find yourself running out of things to do, thanks to random events you'll be scared forever.

    • Game Modes and Difficulty
    • In addition to several CornField maps, the full version also offers several game modes and difficulties.

    • Player progression
    • Thanks to several games played, you will grow stronger, both as a killer and as a survivor. Throughout the games, you'll have the power to find money, which will allow you to buy all sorts of items.

    • Features in multiplayer mode
    • Take advantage of voice chat that reacts to distance from others. Be careful though, the killer can hear you too and will come after you!

    Multiplayer

    In addition to the singleplayer mode, CornField also offers multiplayer for up to 5 players, with one of the players being the killer. In some situations, you will have to work together to survive this nightmare and escape without being killed by the killer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950/Radeon R7 370 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should work even on worse components than those listed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060/Radeon RX 580 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
